Table	Create Table
scheduled_enrichments	CREATE TABLE `scheduled_enrichments` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `projectId` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `scheduledAt` timestamp NOT NULL,
  `recurrence` enum('once','daily','weekly') COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'once',
  `batchSize` int(11) DEFAULT '50',
  `maxClients` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `timeout` int(11) DEFAULT '3600',
  `status` enum('pending','running','completed','cancelled') COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending',
  `lastRunAt` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `nextRunAt` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `createdAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) /*T![clustered_index] CLUSTERED */
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci
